subject: Forgot an item #SSN5577
description_text:
Hello, I just received my Simpson Pro X Ultra package, but the heightening
plate for the heel support was missing. Could you please send it to me with
the correct screws, which are also missing?

conversations.body_text: Hi Grégory,  It’s possible the baseplate was shipped separately. I’ll ask our operations team to check whether it was sent in a separate parcel and get back to you as soon as possible. Could you please provide your order number (e.g., SSNXXXX) so we can look it up?

Hi Grégory,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Is this particular part missing? Is the LED strip module missing?  Please confirm as soon as possible. We will resend the missing part to you promptly.

#SSN5577

This isn't the base plate for the pedals; it's the second, smaller plate
for the heels.

Le ven. 16 janv. 2026, 06:50, Grégory <gregory.pommier13@gmail.com> a
écrit :

> #SSN5577
>
> Le ven. 16 janv. 2026, 04:17, service@simsonn.com

Yes is that missing

Le ven. 16 janv. 2026, 09:14, service@simsonn.com
Hi Grégory,    Okay, here's your reshipped link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047245960590
